title: Bedrock Robotics’ $270M Series B paves the way for operator-less excavators
description:
Bedrock Robotics has raised money to scale autonomous construction fleets, tackling labor shortages with operator-less machines.

The post Bedrock Robotics’ $270M Series B paves the way for operator-less excavators appeared first on The Robot Report.
